testcase.classname: Trello Board and Card API Operations
testcase.name: Create board, add cards, update and delete
testcase.system-out: Given the Trello API key and token are configured...........................passed When a new board is created via Trello API..................................passed And two cards are added to the board........................................passed And one of the cards is randomly selected and updated.......................passed Then all created cards are deleted..........................................passed And the board is deleted....................................................passed
